title: Foundation Building - Week 2
subtitle: Increasing consistency and building momentum
videoDescription: Learn how to progress safely and build on your first week's foundation.
description: Building on week one, we'll extend your walks and add targeted mobility work. Focus on consistency over intensity as you develop sustainable movement habits.
objectives: Track energy levels throughout the day
keyPoints: Notice how movement affects your energy
Morning movement sets the tone for your day
Posture awareness prevents pain and injury
Nature walks provide mental health benefits
